meanings.definition: A small box on a computer screen that can be clicked to select an option or perform a function.
meanings.sent1: I clicked the checkbox to choose my favorite color.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to tick the checkbox if you agree to the terms.
meanings.sent3: The checkbox on the screen looked like a tiny treasure chest waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up as she clicked the checkbox, unlocking a world of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The checkbox glowed invitingly, beckoning me to make a decision.

meanings.definition: A small box on a form that can be checked to indicate a choice or answer.
meanings.sent1: Don't forget to fill in the checkbox next to your name.
meanings.sent2: She marked the checkbox next to her preferred time slot.
meanings.sent3: The checkbox on the form seemed to wink at me mischievously.
meanings.sent4: As I checked the box, it felt like sealing a pact with destiny.
meanings.sent5: The checkbox stood out on the page, demanding attention like a tiny sentinel.
